attributes.action: Provide Statutory Parental Pay to both Parents
attributes.additional_details:
Less females in top positions - often due to career gap for maternity and subsequent reduction in hours for ongoing support
Dads/ second parent are not provided opportunity to have paid time off with little one without impacting mums time/ pay
Wealth of evidence that children benefit from a two person household
attributes.background: Both parents should be provided with the opportunity to take parental leave (maternity or paternity) and receive payment without impacting each other.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638109
